com.corajr.loom.mappings

Class Draw

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.corajr.loom.mappings.Draw

  • public class Draw
extends Object
    Classes for various drawing commands. When added to a pattern, these commands will be attached to the current PApplet and will execute in its graphics context.
    Author:
    corajr

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Draw.Compound
      Combines several different DrawCommands into a single command.
      static class  Draw.Ellipse
      Draws an ellipse.
      static class  Draw.Forward
      Draw a line by a specified amount and translate to the end of that line.
      static class  Draw.Line
      Draws a line from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2).
      static class  Draw.Noop
      Do nothing.
      static class  Draw.Pop
      Pop a transformation matrix of the draw context from the stack.
      static class  Draw.Push
      Push the current transformation matrix of the draw context to the stack.
      static class  Draw.Rect
      Draws a rectangle.
      static class  Draw.Rotate
      Rotate the drawing context by the specified amount.
      static class  Draw.Translate
      Translates the drawing context.

    • Field Detail

      • NOOP

        public static final Draw.Noop NOOP
        NOOP is useful for instructions that are to be ignored, i.e. constants in an L-system that do not draw anything.

                             float y1,
                             float x2,
                             float y2)
        Make a new Line.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x-coordinate of first point
        y1 - y-coordinate of first point
        x2 - x-coordinate of second point
        y2 - y-coordinate of first point
        Returns:
        a new Line

                             float y,
                             float w,
                             float h)
        Make a new Rect.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of upper-left corner
        y - the y-coordinate of upper-left corner
        w - the width of the rectangle
        h - the height of the rectangle
        Returns:
        a new Rect

        public static Draw.Ellipse ellipse(float x,
                                   float y,
                                   float w,
                                   float h)
        Make a new Ellipse.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the center
        y - the y-coordinate of the center
        w - the length of the horizontal axis
        h - the length of the vertical axis
        Returns:
        a new Ellipse

        public static Draw.Translate translate(float x,
                                       float y)
        Make a new Translate.
        Parameters:
        x - the amount to translate horizontally in pixels
        y - the amount to translate vertically in pixels
        Returns:
        a new Translate

      • c

        public static Draw.Compound c(DrawCommand... commands)
        Shorthand to combine multiple DrawCommands into a single command.
        Parameters:
        commands - the DrawCommands to be combined
        Returns:
        a compound command that calls `draw()` on all members when called.
